name: Crash Prevention
description:
Hi I'm Franman,  I'm from Argentina. I consider myself a noob at making games and this is the first time that I join a gamejam. However Im not dissapointed with the result, also this is the first game that I have ever managed to finish so I think that counts as my first game.

Special Thanks to:

"Obi Juan Cannabis" for being my beta tester. Happy Birthday to you also!
